<WL5G3N0:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:WL5G3N0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:WL5G3N1="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults"> <WL5G3N0:types> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Subscription%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:element name="ClientException" type="uct:ClientExceptionType"/> <xsd:element name="ServerException" type="uct:ServerExceptionType"/> </xsd:schema> </WL5G3N0:types> <WL5G3N0:message name="ServerException"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:ServerException" name="ServerException"/> </WL5G3N0:message> <WL5G3N0:message name="ClientException"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:ClientException" name="ClientException"/> </WL5G3N0:message> </WL5G3N0:definitions>

<!--October 11, 2011--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information of the user’s address. 30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="streetNumber" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="locality" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User’s e-mail address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic yes/no flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"/> <xsd:enumeration value="no"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence of simple general string parameters, to be used as filter criteria in requests. Parameter. Multiplicity may be greater than 1 (multiple filtering fields)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fields" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of possible gender values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="male"/> <xsd:enumeration value="female"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImeiType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImsiType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic name-value pair</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="param" type="tns:NameValuePairType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SipUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimestampType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string" default="Olson"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="tel:.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="phoneNumber" type="tns:E164Type"/> <xsd:element name="anyUri" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="tns:IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="alias" type="tns:AliasType"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="tns:OtherIdType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="E164Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A phone number. Is a maximum of 15 digits following the E164 format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4" type="tns:Ipv4AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="ipv6" type="tns:Ipv6AddressType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv4 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv6 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AliasType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OtherIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lastName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="firstName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="middleName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SEC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0000"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="endpoint" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleOAuthHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with NO Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>xoauth_requestor_id for 2-legged access and oauth_token for 3-legged access</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="xoauth_requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="oauth_token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--Release Date: July 06, 2010--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Subscription%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:complexType name="ResultCodeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="resultCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:union memberTypes="tns:CodesType xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CodesType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Pending"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The subscription to the Service was not completed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The User was correctly subscribed to the Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ChannelTypeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="channelType"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:union memberTypes="tns:ChannelsType xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ChannelsType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="WEB Portal"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested from WEB Portal</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="WAP Portal"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested from WAP Portal</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="CRM"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested from CRM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="SMS"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested by an SMS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="IVR"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested by Interactive Voice Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="SP Website"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested from the SP Website</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="UE"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activation/Deactivation requested from the UE</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ReasonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="reason"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:union memberTypes="tns:ReasonsType xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReasonsType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Per User's request"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deactivation requested because the User requests it.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Per unpaid"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deactivation requested because the User has not paid</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="PolicyInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>’Policy Info’ mapped from gSDP Data Model</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="operator" type="tns:OBIDType"/> <xsd:element name="policy" type="tns:SLAType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OBIDType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of the OB</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="countryCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="OBCode" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SLAType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Level Agreement</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SLAId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="SLAValue" type="tns:SLAValueType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SLAValueType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="valueType1" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="valueType2" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="valueType3" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="valueType4" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="valueType5" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="valueType6" type="xsd:time"/> <xsd:element name="valueType7"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="valueType8"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="xsd:dateTime" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="valueType9"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="valueType10"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="valueType11"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="xsd:time" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="valueType12"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This one is for the RRPP SLA in gSDP Data Model</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="child_value" type="tns:TrafficControlType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TrafficControlType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defined according to RRPP SLA in gSDP Data Model</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="rate" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="periodType" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Subscription%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_OProv_Subscriptions_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:simpleType name="ToqType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="EventIdType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serviceId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="applicationId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="assetId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="contentId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="contentProfileId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="uct:OtherIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GenericPurchaseInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="subPurchaseCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="priceCurrencyCode" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="taxes" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--Release Date: July 06, 2010--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/1" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" xmlns:ns1="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Subscription%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:complexType name="AppAPIType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>API used by an Application that wants to be activated</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="API" type="tns:BasicDescriptionType"/> <xsd:element name="APIAsset" type="tns:BasicDescriptionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicDescriptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic description of an API or an Asset and its Traffic Control Policies</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--Release Date: September 10, 2012--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/5" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/OProv_Subscriptions/v1/5" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Subscription%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProductPurchaseInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="isIncremental" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="ProductList" type="tns:ProductListType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="product" type="tns:ProductType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="productId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="productClass" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="tns:ProductStatusType"/> <xsd:element name="startDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="endDate" Now nothing but a small-time promoter, Charlie earns just enough money piecing together low-end bots from scrap metal to get from one underground boxing venue to the next. When Charlie hits rock bottom, he reluctantly teams up with his estranged son Max (Dakota Goyo) to build and train a championship contender. As the stakes in the brutal, no-holds-barred arena are raised, Charlie and Max, against all odds, get one last shot at a comeback.</a:Description> <a:RequiresPin>false</a:RequiresPin> <WL5G3N0:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:WL5G3N0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:WL5G3N1="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults"> <WL5G3N0:types> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1/faults" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/GAL/OProv_Management_http?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FOProv_Management%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <xsd:element name="ClientException" type="uct:ClientExceptionType"/> <xsd:element name="ServerException" type="uct:ServerExceptionType"/> </xsd:schema> </WL5G3N0:types> <WL5G3N0:message name="ServerException"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:ServerException" name="ServerException"/> </WL5G3N0:message> <WL5G3N0:message name="ClientException"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:ClientException" name="ClientException"/> </WL5G3N0:message> </WL5G3N0:definitions>

<!--October 11, 2011--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information of the user’s address. 30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="streetNumber" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="locality" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User’s e-mail address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic yes/no flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"/> <xsd:enumeration value="no"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence of simple general string parameters, to be used as filter criteria in requests. Parameter. Multiplicity may be greater than 1 (multiple filtering fields)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fields" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of possible gender values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="male"/> <xsd:enumeration value="female"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImeiType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImsiType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic name-value pair</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="param" type="tns:NameValuePairType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SipUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimestampType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string" default="Olson"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="tel:.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="phoneNumber" type="tns:E164Type"/> <xsd:element name="anyUri" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="tns:IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="alias" type="tns:AliasType"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="tns:OtherIdType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="E164Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A phone number. Is a maximum of 15 digits following the E164 format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4" type="tns:Ipv4AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="ipv6" type="tns:Ipv6AddressType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv4 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv6 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AliasType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OtherIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lastName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="firstName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="middleName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SEC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0000"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="endpoint" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleOAuthHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with NO Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>xoauth_requestor_id for 2-legged access and oauth_token for 3-legged access</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="xoauth_requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="oauth_token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="streetNumber" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="locality" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User’s e-mail address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic yes/no flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"/> <xsd:enumeration value="no"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence of simple general string parameters, to be used as filter criteria in requests. Parameter. Multiplicity may be greater than 1 (multiple filtering fields)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fields" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of possible gender values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="male"/> <xsd:enumeration value="female"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImeiType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImsiType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic name-value pair</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="param" type="tns:NameValuePairType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SipUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimestampType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string" default="Olson"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="tel:.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="phoneNumber" type="tns:E164Type"/> <xsd:element name="anyUri" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="tns:IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="alias" type="tns:AliasType"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="tns:OtherIdType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="E164Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A phone number. Is a maximum of 15 digits following the E164 format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4" type="tns:Ipv4AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="ipv6" type="tns:Ipv6AddressType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv4 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv6 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AliasType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OtherIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lastName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="firstName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="middleName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SEC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0000"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="endpoint" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleOAuthHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with NO Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>xoauth_requestor_id for 2-legged access and oauth_token for 3-legged access</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="xoauth_requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="oauth_token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<WL5G3N0:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2/transaction_info_header" xmlns:WL5G3N0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:WL5G3N1="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2/transaction_info_header"> <WL5G3N0:types> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2/transaction_info_header" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/wsdl/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2/transaction_info_header" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="transactionInfoHeader" type="tns:TransactionInfoHeaderType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TransactionInfoHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Includes the Service Identifier, the Application Identifier, the Asset Identifier and a Transaction Identifier</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="servId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="appId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="assetId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="appProviderId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="uplinkTransactionInfoHeader" type="tns:UplinkTransactionInfoHeaderType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UplinkTransactionInfoHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Includes a Transaction Identifier</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </WL5G3N0:types> <WL5G3N0:message name="TransactionInfoHeader"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:transactionInfoHeader" name="transactionInfoHeader"/> </WL5G3N0:message> <WL5G3N0:message name="UplinkTransactionInfoHeader"> <WL5G3N0:part element="WL5G3N1:uplinkTransactionInfoHeader" name="uplinkTransactionInfoHeader"/> </WL5G3N0:message> </WL5G3N0:definitions>

<!--October 11, 2011--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information of the user’s address. 30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="streetNumber" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="locality" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User’s e-mail address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic yes/no flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"/> <xsd:enumeration value="no"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence of simple general string parameters, to be used as filter criteria in requests. Parameter. Multiplicity may be greater than 1 (multiple filtering fields)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fields" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of possible gender values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="male"/> <xsd:enumeration value="female"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImeiType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImsiType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic name-value pair</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="param" type="tns:NameValuePairType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SipUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimestampType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string" default="Olson"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="tel:.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="phoneNumber" type="tns:E164Type"/> <xsd:element name="anyUri" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="tns:IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="alias" type="tns:AliasType"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="tns:OtherIdType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="E164Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A phone number. Is a maximum of 15 digits following the E164 format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4" type="tns:Ipv4AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="ipv6" type="tns:Ipv6AddressType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv4 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv6 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AliasType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OtherIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>30112009 Included. minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="middleName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SEC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0000"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="endpoint" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleOAuthHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with NO Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>xoauth_requestor_id for 2-legged access and oauth_token for 3-legged access</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="xoauth_requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="oauth_token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--22 July, 2011--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/product/v1/types" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/product/v1/types" xmlns:uct="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/UNICA_SDP/Product/Notification?SCHEMA%2FOSBGAL%2Fservices%2Fresources%2Fnorthbound%2Fwsdl%2FUNICA%2FProductNotification%2FUNICA_API_SOAP_common_types_v1_1"/> <!--Main data structures--> <xsd:complexType name="ProductInfoType" abstract="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Product definition, basic data, abstract type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="productId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="comercialCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="priceAmount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="priceCurrency" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="priceTax" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="startDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="endDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="producer" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductManagementType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Single product loading</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="productInfo" type="tns:ProductInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="operation" type="tns:ProductOperationType"/> <xsd:element name="manualValidation" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductManagementListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="product" type="tns:ProductManagementType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductOperationResultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Single product loading result</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="productId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="result" type="tns:OperationResultType"/> <xsd:element name="details" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductManagementResultListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="tns:ProductOperationResultType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Enumerated types--> <xsd:simpleType name="ProductOperationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Operations to be performed for a single product loading</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Create"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Update"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Delete"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OperationResultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result of the operation for a single product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Done"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Denied"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failed"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ManagingProcessStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Models the status of multiple product loading process</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Processing"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Done"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Failed"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Types of operations--> <xsd:element name="manageProducts"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiple product loading</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="callback" type="uct:SimpleReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="products" type="tns:ProductManagementListType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="manageProductsResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiple product loading response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="status" type="tns:ManagingProcessStatusType"/> <xsd:element name="results" type="tns:ProductManagementResultListType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="notifyProductsManaging"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiple product notification (asynchronous behavior)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="tns:ManagingProcessStatusType"/> <xsd:element name="results" type="tns:ProductManagementResultListType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="notifyProductsManagingResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<!--October 11, 2011--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information of the user’s address. 30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="streetNumber" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="locality" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postalCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User’s e-mail address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic yes/no flag</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"/> <xsd:enumeration value="no"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence of simple general string parameters, to be used as filter criteria in requests. Parameter. Multiplicity may be greater than 1 (multiple filtering fields)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fields" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of possible gender values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="male"/> <xsd:enumeration value="female"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImeiType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ImsiType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic name-value pair</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="param" type="tns:NameValuePairType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SipUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TimestampType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string" default="Olson"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TelUriType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="tel:.+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserIdType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="phoneNumber" type="tns:E164Type"/> <xsd:element name="anyUri" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="ipAddress" type="tns:IpAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="alias" type="tns:AliasType"/> <xsd:element name="otherId" type="tns:OtherIdType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="E164Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A phone number. Is a maximum of 15 digits following the E164 format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="IpAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ipv4" type="tns:Ipv4AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="ipv6" type="tns:Ipv6AddressType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv4 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An IPv6 address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9a-fA-F]+:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]+)|(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?::(([0-9a-fA-F]+:)*[0-9a-fA-F]+)?"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AliasType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OtherIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>30112009 Included. Reason: update for SIM Backup API</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lastName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="firstName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="middleName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SEC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0000"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionCategory"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SVR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="variables" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="endpoint" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleOAuthHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with NO Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>xoauth_requestor_id for 2-legged access and oauth_token for 3-legged access</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="xoauth_requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="oauth_token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="requestor_id" type="tns:UserIdType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
